Desc.entry: A volunteer run hospital broadcasting service and registered charity which operates 24 hours daily for patients in 4 Sheffield hospitals (Royal Hallamshire, Northern General, Weston Park and Jessop Wing). Friends and relatives of people in hospital can make requests and send a get well message. Membership open to any person aged 16 years or over. Has studio facilities, eg editing and recording materials.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun 12noon-3pm & 7-10pm (daily live radio shows), main base is at the Royal Hallamshire Hospital but collects requests and visit wards at all main hospitals in Sheffield
